AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqAIX72GE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for AIX72: Checks whether AIX version is greater than or equal to 7.2.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_brokenlinks
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 2.4 Ensure unused symbolic links are removed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 3.1 Ensure default user umask is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_find_ownerless

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.7 Ensure CDE screensaver lock is enabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_cde_labelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.8 Ensure CDE login screen hostname is masked.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.labelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_cde_perslabelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.8 Ensure CDE login screen hostname is masked.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.persLabelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chpermxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.9 Ensure access to /etc/dt/config/Xconfig is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chownxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.9 Ensure access to /etc/dt/config/Xconfig is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chpermxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.10 Ensure the file /etc/dt/config/Xservers is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chownxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.10 Ensure the file /etc/dt/config/Xservers is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chpermxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.11 Ensure access to Xresources is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chownxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.1.11 Ensure access to Xresources is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.2.1 Ensure root access to ftpd is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_ftpbanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.2.2 Ensure ftpd login banner is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_ftpd_noworldaccess
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.2.3 Ensure ftpd umask is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_sshversionv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.1 Ensure latest version of openssh is installed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.2 Ensure /etc/shosts.equiv and /etc/rhosts.equiv are removed.

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv3_sshd_sftp_server_args
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.3 Ensure sftp-server arguments are configured.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: MULTIPLE Subsystem "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l INFO" "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l DEBUG" /etc/ssh/sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: cisv1_shosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.4 Ensure sshd access is configured.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.6 Ensure sshd Ciphers are configured.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements CIS Recommendation AIX7 4.7.3.7 Ensure sshd HostbasedAuthentication is disabled.
